 @ResponseBody

      • getFullDescritionFlight

        @RequestMapping(value="/{codeFlight}",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json; charset=UTF-8")
 @ResponseBody
public FullDescriptionFlight getFullDescritionFlight(@PathVariable(value="codeFlight")
                                                                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String codeFlight)
        Get a full description of code flight passed for parameter.
        Parameters:
        codeFlight - number of specific flight.
        Returns:
        FullDescriptionFlight a full description of flight.

      • filter

        @RequestMapping(value="/",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json; charset=UTF-8",
                produces="application/json; charset=UTF-8")
 @ResponseBody
public java.util.Collection<SimpleFlight> filter(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     FilterRequest filterRequest)
        Do a filter on flights using the json passed and return all the basic data of flights in the filter.
        Parameters:
        filterRequest - a object to mapping the parameters.
        Returns:
        Collection SimpleFlight a list with the basic data of flights.
